about_the_game:
This Soundtrack and Digital Goods Bundle includes the official We Happy Few soundtrack in .MP3 and .FLAC format, along with other digital goodies to fill your life with Joy:
  • Desktop wallpapers featuring a mix of 4K screenshots and concept art
  • Phone wallpapers
  • Ringtones, including soundtrack clips and other iconic lines from the game
  • A lyric sheet so you can sing along!
The soundtrack includes songs from the game as well as The Make Believes, a tailor-made boy band paying tribute to the swinging sounds of the ‘60s, with original tunes created just for We Happy Few. The Make Believes are:
  • Murray A. Lightburn - Lead Vocals, Guitar, Bass
  • Brad Barr - Lead Vocals, Guitar
  • Andrew Barr - Drums, Percussion, Backing Vocals
  • Patrick Watson - Lead Vocals, Keyboards
